sellerAgent.name: The Janice Overbeck Real Estate Team

data.description: Great Find In Desirable Mainstreet Community In Stone Mountain. Nice Home Is Situated On Private, Cul-De-Sac Lot. 2-Story Home Features Large Master & Additional Bedrooms Upstairs. Newly Remodeled Master Bath. New Interior Paint! LVP Flooring Throughout Entire Home. Family Room With Cozy Fireplace Opens To Dining Room. Sunny Kitchen With Stainless Steel Appliances. Newer HVAC 2 Years & Roof 5 Years. Must See ... Priced To Sell! Take advantage of a 1%, 1-year interest rate buydown provided by my preferred lender, Kim King with Bank South.
